channel.title: Lock plox
channel.description:
Well heres the story, I contacted moparisthebest about recovering my old account from 2007, which him and me successfully did. but then he went ahead and disabled my account that i was using at the time to pm him and stuff. and i get a message saying "please use your other account" but i can't because he disabled me so i can't loggout lol. heres a screenshot of the message. [img]http://i30.tinypic.com/2znrhck.jpg[/img]
ontop of that, i don't have the rep i gained on my other account and my server status was deleted and it took alot of hard work to get all my votes, i had like in the top 5 most amount of votes =/.
if someone could forward this to moparisthebest that'd be great
P.S. i'm posting this on my friends computer through teamviewer.

item.title: Lock plox
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:6, topic:347855”]I don’t need to fix this, YOU need to clear your cookies. :)[/quote] OH! Alright sorry for bothering you, and thanks for all the help mate.

Read full topic

item.title: Lock plox
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:4, topic:347855”][quote author=Javafire link=topic=444237.msg3261788#msg3261788 date=1278554089]

Might be a reason you were banned?

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
I think moparisthebest has his reasons
[/quote]

No, he sent me an email saying “ok logg onto your old account so i can disable the new one”

and dont’cha think he would ban this account too? this is clearly a mistake.

so i’m beggin that no admins or mods close this untill he has a chance to review this pleas.e[/quote]
i guess, the old account got banned instead, so yeah ask him about it by messaging him, either that or he found your old account was banned long ago…

Read full topic
